list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update dependencies and improve Lua API documentation
Upgraded Docusaurus and Algolia dependencies for better performance and stability. Enhanced Lua API documentation by adding new functions, restructuring sections, and introducing a "Soft whitelists" page. These changes improve usability, interactivity, and maintainability.

task.summary:
Update configuration documentation
Detailed configuration attributes have been added to the documentation. The changes encompass sections including Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains among others. The update improves comprehension and usability.

Update documentation for workspace and Lua support
Detailed configuration attributes have been added to the workspace.xml and lua-support.md documentation. The update includes sections addressing Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains, thus improving comprehension and usability of these features. This discussion provides a more thorough understanding of settings and configurations, facilitating more effective use of the system.

Updated workspace documentation and Lua support
Expanded the lua-support.md and workspace.xml documentation with detailed configuration attributes enhancing comprehension and usability. The updates cover sections including Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains, providing an in-depth understanding of system settings and configurations. Increased local task counter to mirror the updates.

Refactor documentation to focus on LDAP and Lua support
The documentation has been revised to focus solely on LDAP and Lua for configuration, querying, and database type handling. Some sections that mentioned SQL support have been updated to talk only about LDAP or Lua. This revision provides clearer instructions for setting up and using LDAP and Lua with Nauthilus.

Update Docusaurus dependencies and remove Redis documentation
The Redis documentation file has been deleted, leading to the adjustments of the sidebar positions in other files. Docusaurus dependencies in package-lock.json have been updated to the latest versions.

Update Docusaurus configuration, docs, and workspace.xml
Expanded the documentation including new sections for server, front end, and HTTP3 support. Refactored markdown to include more detailed subsections and updated workspace.xml to track additional documentation files and GitHub settings.

Update Docusaurus configuration and dependencies
Updated Docusaurus to version 3.5.2 and added new documentation sections for server, frontend, and HTTP3 support. Refactored markdown with more detailed subsections and modified workspace.xml to track additional documentation files and GitHub settings.

Fix references in docs and update workspace settings
Corrected REST API paths in nginx-mail-plugin and rest-api docs to use consistent routes. Updated .idea/workspace.xml configurations to track changes in documentation files and incremented the localTasksCounter value.

Update workspace tracking and dovecot Lua script improvements
Added .md files to workspace tracking for better documentation oversight. Enhanced dovecot Lua script for more robust error handling and configuration, including added support for json-based authentication and improved HTTP request logic. Updated REST API documentation to reflect new endpoints and configuration details.

Update documentation and workspace settings
Added new sections to docs for community support, features like SSO in Keycloak, and updates to Lua configuration, including Redis custom pools and Prometheus integration. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to track these changes for improved documentation oversight. Enhanced clarity and accessibility of existing documentation with additional examples and links.

Add new configuration sections and Lua script features
Updated documentation with new server configurations, including `disabled_endpoints`, `http_client`, and `backend_server_monitoring`. Enhanced Lua functionality with features like Redis custom pools and backend server monitoring support. Improved clarity and consistency across documentation with examples, links, and updated workspace settings.

Add new configuration sections and Lua script features
Updated documentation to include new server configurations, such as `disabled_endpoints`, `http_client`, and `backend_server_monitoring`. Improved Lua scripts with support for Redis custom pools and backend server monitoring. Enhanced documentation clarity and consistency with updated examples, links, and workspace tracking adjustments.

Refactored Lua support documentation.
The Lua support documentation has been split into many smaller pages to enhance the user experience.

Add pan-zoom support for Mermaid diagrams and refine layout
Introduced `panzoom` integration to allow interactive zooming and panning for Mermaid diagrams, enhancing user interactivity. Updated CSS styles and added a dynamic description for usability. Refined project dependencies, including `panzoom`, and adjusted DOM observation for rendering Mermaid containers effectively.

Update dependencies and refine documentation warnings
Upgraded Docusaurus and Algolia-related dependencies to improve stability and performance. Replaced deprecated `:::warn` syntax with `:::warning` in documentation. Enhanced project configuration for better maintainability and interaction features.

MESSAGE.value:
Update configuration documentation
Detailed configuration attributes have been added to the documentation. The changes encompass sections including Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains among others. The update improves comprehension and usability.

Update documentation for workspace and Lua support
Detailed configuration attributes have been added to the workspace.xml and lua-support.md documentation. The update includes sections addressing Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains, thus improving comprehension and usability of these features. This discussion provides a more thorough understanding of settings and configurations, facilitating more effective use of the system.

Updated workspace documentation and Lua support
Expanded the lua-support.md and workspace.xml documentation with detailed configuration attributes enhancing comprehension and usability. The updates cover sections including Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains, providing an in-depth understanding of system settings and configurations. Increased local task counter to mirror the updates.

Refactor documentation to focus on LDAP and Lua support
The documentation has been revised to focus solely on LDAP and Lua for configuration, querying, and database type handling. Some sections that mentioned SQL support have been updated to talk only about LDAP or Lua. This revision provides clearer instructions for setting up and using LDAP and Lua with Nauthilus.

Update Docusaurus dependencies and remove Redis documentation
The Redis documentation file has been deleted, leading to the adjustments of the sidebar positions in other files. Docusaurus dependencies in package-lock.json have been updated to the latest versions.

Update Docusaurus configuration, docs, and workspace.xml
Expanded the documentation including new sections for server, front end, and HTTP3 support. Refactored markdown to include more detailed subsections and updated workspace.xml to track additional documentation files and GitHub settings.

Update Docusaurus config, docs, and workspace.xml
Expanded documentation with new sections for server, front end, and HTTP3 support. Refactored markdown for detailed subsections. Updated workspace.xml to track additional doc files and GitHub settings.

Update Docusaurus configuration and dependencies
Updated Docusaurus to version 3.5.2 and added new documentation sections for server, frontend, and HTTP3 support. Refactored markdown with more detailed subsections and modified workspace.xml to track additional documentation files and GitHub settings.

Fix references in docs and update workspace settings
Corrected REST API paths in nginx-mail-plugin and rest-api docs to use consistent routes. Updated .idea/workspace.xml configurations to track changes in documentation files and incremented the localTasksCounter value.

Update API paths and dovecot-lua.md for streamlined auth
Updated references to use consistent API paths for various authentication services. Enhanced the dovecot-lua.md example with more descriptive variable names and added support for session handling and JSON-based configurations.

Update workspace tracking and dovecot Lua script improvements
Added .md files to workspace tracking for better documentation oversight. Enhanced dovecot Lua script for more robust error handling and configuration, including added support for json-based authentication and improved HTTP request logic. Updated REST API documentation to reflect new endpoints and configuration details.

Update documentation and workspace settings
Added new sections to docs for community support, features like SSO in Keycloak, and updates to Lua configuration, including Redis custom pools and Prometheus integration. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to track these changes for improved documentation oversight. Enhanced clarity and accessibility of existing documentation with additional examples and links.

Add new configuration sections and Lua script features
Updated documentation with new server configurations, including `disabled_endpoints`, `http_client`, and `backend_server_monitoring`. Enhanced Lua functionality with features like Redis custom pools and backend server monitoring support. Improved clarity and consistency across documentation with examples, links, and updated workspace settings.

Add new configuration sections and Lua script features
Updated documentation to include new server configurations, such as `disabled_endpoints`, `http_client`, and `backend_server_monitoring`. Improved Lua scripts with support for Redis custom pools and backend server monitoring. Enhanced documentation clarity and consistency with updated examples, links, and workspace tracking adjustments.

Remove Lua support documentation.
Deleted the extensive Lua support documentation in `docs/configuration/lua-support.md`. This material is no longer relevant or required in the repository and helps streamline documentation content.

Remove Lua support documentation
Deleted the extensive Lua support documentation from the repository. This may indicate either the deprecation of Lua as an integration or a migration of this content to a different location or format for better maintenance and usage.

Remove Lua support documentation.
The `lua-support.md` file was deleted, as its contents are no longer needed or relevant. This simplifies the documentation structure by removing redundant or outdated information.

Remove Lua support documentation.
The Lua support documentation for Nauthilus was entirely removed from the repository. This may indicate deprecation or migration of Lua capabilities, and users should consult other resources for information on Lua integration.

Remove Lua support documentation.
Deleted extensive documentation on Lua support as it is no longer relevant or necessary for the project. This cleanup reduces repository bloat and ensures that only essential documentation is maintained.

Remove Lua support documentation.
The Lua support documentation has been deleted as part of repository cleanup. This might indicate deprecation or migration of Lua-related features, pending further updates on functionality changes.

Remove Lua support documentation
The Lua support documentation for Nauthilus has been completely removed. This change suggests that Lua-related functionality may no longer require dedicated documentation or might have been deprecated. Ensure compatibility or reference alternative resources if required.

Refactored Lua support documentation.
The Lua support documentation has been split into many smaller pages to enhance the user experience.

Add pan-zoom support for Mermaid diagrams and refine layout
Introduced `panzoom` integration to allow interactive zooming and panning for Mermaid diagrams, enhancing user interactivity. Updated CSS styles and added a dynamic description for usability. Refined project dependencies, including `panzoom`, and adjusted DOM observation for rendering Mermaid containers effectively.

Update dependencies and refine documentation warnings
Upgraded Docusaurus and Algolia-related dependencies to improve stability and performance. Replaced deprecated `:::warn` syntax with `:::warning` in documentation. Enhanced project configuration for better maintainability and interaction features.

Update dependencies and improve Lua API documentation
Upgraded Docusaurus and Algolia dependencies for better performance and stability. Enhanced Lua API documentation by adding new functions, restructuring sections, and introducing a "Soft whitelists" page. These changes improve usability, interactivity, and maintainability.
